alert.note: Alert for Grayson; Hardin; Hart; Larue (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Larue, northern Hart, southeastern Grayson and south central Hardin Counties through 615 PM EDT/515 PM CDT/... At 543 PM EDT/443 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Munfordville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Hart, southeastern Grayson, south central Hardin and southwestern Larue Counties, including the following locations... Seven Corners, Wabash, Bonnieville, Lines Mill, Broad Ford, Flint Hill, Pearman, Wax, Vento and Priceville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for central Kentucky.
